summary.coverage: All requirements covered by E2E tests

requirements.1.1: Welcome screen with options to upload data or try demo data
requirements.1.2: Automatic CSV format detection and validation
requirements.1.3: Data preview showing first 10 rows with summary statistics
requirements.1.5: Backtest completion within 5 seconds for datasets up to 10,000 rows
requirements.2.1: Display popular strategy templates (MA Crossover, RSI, IBS)
requirements.2.2: Show strategy logic with visual indicators and descriptions
requirements.2.3: Real-time preview of strategy on mini-chart
requirements.2.4: Support MA (SMA, EMA), RSI, and IBS indicators with customizable periods
requirements.2.5: Support indicator-based, time-based, take profit, and stop loss exits
requirements.2.6: Offer fixed amount, percentage, and risk-based position sizing
requirements.3.1: Allow setting initial capital with $10,000 default
requirements.3.2: Support fixed amount, percentage, and risk-based position sizing
requirements.3.3: Support fixed and percentage-based commission structures
requirements.3.5: Support leverage from 1:1 to customizable values
requirements.3.6: Enforce maximum of 1 simultaneous position (long only)
requirements.4.1: Display hero dashboard with total return, benchmark comparison, max drawdown
requirements.4.2: Provide interactive TradingView charts (price, volume, equity, drawdown)
requirements.4.3: Display contextual tooltips with detailed time period information
requirements.4.4: Display celebratory animations for exceptional performance (>20% annual)
requirements.4.5: Provide progressive disclosure with Level 1, 2, and 3 metrics
requirements.5.1: Display all trades with entry/exit dates, prices, duration, P&L, exit reasons
requirements.5.2: Show detailed trade context with market conditions and indicator values
requirements.5.3: Support filtering by date range, profitability, and duration
requirements.5.4: Support sorting by date, return percentage, and duration
requirements.5.5: Warn users if fewer than 30 trades are generated
requirements.6.1: Generate smart insights about market conditions for strategy performance
requirements.6.2: Provide specific improvement suggestions with projected impact
requirements.6.3: Warn about insufficient trade count and reliability concerns
requirements.6.4: Validate signal correctness and warn about look-ahead bias
requirements.6.5: Suggest alternative indicator periods with expected performance impact
requirements.7.1: Display multi-panel command center layout on desktop (1440px+)
requirements.7.2: Provide tab-based navigation with touch-friendly controls on tablet (768px-1439px)
requirements.7.3: Display wizard-style flow with thumb-zone design on mobile (320px-767px)
requirements.7.4: Maintain <3s load time and <5s backtest time performance targets
requirements.7.5: Maintain 60fps smooth scrolling and responsive interactions
requirements.8.1: Store data only in browser memory without localStorage
requirements.8.2: Handle up to 10,000 rows of OHLCV data efficiently
requirements.8.3: Provide transparent formulas and methodology for all metrics
requirements.8.4: Provide clear, actionable error messages with recovery suggestions
requirements.8.5: Be compatible with Chrome 90+, Firefox 88+, Safari 14+, Edge 90+
